text: Metropolitan Theodosius (secular name Frank Lazor; October 27, 1933October 19, 2020) was the primate of the Orthodox Church in America (OCA) from 1977 until his retirement in 2002. He retired due to bad health. He was born in Canonsburg, Pennsylvania. Theodosius died in Canonsburg from problems caused by multiple strokes on October 19, 2020, aged 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:People from Pennsylvania
title: Theodosius (Lazor)
